name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blank New Tab Page - Dark mode support

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blank new tab page. Supports OS dark mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overrides the default Chrome new tab with a completely blank page to remove distractions.

* Supports dark mode. Works if you change your color scheme on your operating system

All the code is open source https://github.com/shreshthmohan/blank-new-tab

You can ask for new features too: https://github.com/shreshthmohan/blank-new-tab/issues
